title: Переживу
overview: "I will outlive everything and everyone," sang Monetochka. Her healing hit gave the name to Boris Barabanov's musical travel show, where artists in exile talk about their new lives.Monetochka, "Nervy", "Pornofilmy", "AloeVera", Tequilajazzz and many others - they all condemned the full-scale military invasion of Russia in Ukraine. They all had to leave their homeland and face various difficulties. And they all found new paths for creativity.
